core

Class VGDLSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.VGDLSprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Conveyor, Flicker, Immovable, Missile, MovingAvatar, Passive, RandomNPC, SpriteProducer

    public abstract class VGDLSprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: Diego Date: 17/10/13 Time: 10:59 This is a Java port from Tom Schaul's VGDL - https://github.com/schaul/py-vgdl

      void _draw(java.awt.Graphics2D gphx, Game game)
      Draws the not-oriented part of the sprite
      void _drawImage(java.awt.Graphics2D gphx, Game game)
      Draws the not-oriented part of the sprite, as an image. this.image must be not null.
      void _drawOriented(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      In case this sprite is oriented and has an arrow to draw, it draws it.

      Updates the position of the sprite, giving its orientation and speed.

      Returns the velocity of the sprite, in a Vector2d object.

      Applies both the passive and active movement for the avatar in the forward model.

      Modifies the amount of resource by a given quantity.

      Parses parameters for the sprite, received as a SpriteContent object.

      Method to perform post processing when the sprite has received its parameters.

      Used to indicate if this sprite was created by the avatar.

        public boolean invisible
        Indicates if the sprite is invisible. If it is, the effect is that it is not drawn.

      • itypes

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> itypes
        List of types this sprite belongs to. It contains the ids, including itself's, from this sprite up in the hierarchy of sprites defined in SpriteSet in the game definition.

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> resources
        Indicates the amount of resources this sprite has, for each type defined as its int identifier.

        Modifies the amount of resource by a given quantity.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - id of the resource whose quantity must be changed.
        amount_delta - amount of units the resource has to be modified by.
